ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from deleting Quote Line Items after an Opportunity is Closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Send to Order Management"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Lost")), Number_of_Quote_Line_Items__c < PRIORVALUE(Number_of_Quote_Line_Items__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote Line Items cannot be deleted because the Opportunity is Closed.
